description:
Hakufu and her crew get jobs in the hopes of earning enough money to attend tournaments stacked with the strongest opponents they can find! Things get crazy when her little sis shows up!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Kriegskunst ist für den Staat von größter Bedeutung
Hei wa Kuni no Daiji Nari
L`art de la guerre est d`une importance vitale pour l`état
Siła militarna to ważna sprawa stanu
War Is of Vital Importance to the State
